data.message: This is great I connected with my 2 sisters on fb after years of no communication and now we all talk all the time!!!! 😃😃😃😃

replies.message: Thanks for sharing, Jamie! We're happy to help you and your sisters stay connected. :) -Rey

That's awesome.. for myself.. I hadn't saw my father since I was 3.. about 7 years ago he found me on here, we reconnected and have been super close ever since. Without FB idk that that would ever have happened.😌 Thx Facebook and keep up the incredible work!
Good job, FB, keeping people & family connected 😍
It still won't matter if it is available you gotta be able to afford it and have equipment to use

And second the plane is for Africa....

You have family in Africa and they don't already have internet???

So your family lives a TRIBAL AFRICAN LIFESTYLE?
Since guys working on the Moon and soon Mars...did You get that far FB?😊

Ok maybe you didn't mean what I thought but you said " this is great" to begin your reply to the post referring to the plane.

I see you meant fb has helped not the plane... but you did say what you said so I can only read words not thoughts...luckily I'm able to SEE what you ment now

Facebook has been selling all of our personal data including our biometrics to the federal government while censoring critical issues facing western civilization. Fb is an Internet ghetto. But we are using the enemies platform to get the word out. F u mark Zuckerberg
I had some problem about my id please help me answer to my sms

Joshua Allan Brown - do you have a driver's license? Ever been arrested? Ever go to public school? Those are all public records. FB let's you keep in touch, meet people,.. you CHOSE too use it. If you want to be a shadow, you'll have to work harder at it than just complaining about Zuckerberg.
